message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

This paper addresses the problem of 3D human pose and shape estimation from a single image, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a novel approach that uses a Graph-CNN to regress the 3D location of mesh vertices, which involves graph theory and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.GR (Graphics) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also involves the use of image-based features and model parametrization, which are related to computer vision and artificial intelligence, respectively. Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves the reconstruction of human shape from a single image, which is related to multimedia and graphics. Therefore, cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a likely sub-category.
